title: Oslo
summary: Oslo (/ˈɒzloʊ/ OZ-loh, US also /ˈɒsloʊ/ OSS-loh,[10][11] Norwegian: [ˈʊ̂ʂlʊ] (listen) or [ˈʊ̂slʊ, ˈʊ̀ʂlʊ]) is the capital and most populous city of Norway. It constitutes both a county and a municipality. As of 30 September 2021, the municipality of Oslo had a population of 698,660, while the population of the city's greater urban area was 1,019,513, as of 4 November 2019.[12][13] The metropolitan area had an estimated population of 1.71 million.[14]
